publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3682 Ted Brocklebank: University of St Andrews Fundraising Campaign—That the Parliament supports the multi-million pound fundraising campaign by the University of St Andrews, launched by its new principal, Dr Louise Richardson, to mark the university’s 600th anniversary; applauds the university’s aim to create bursaries to attract talented students from poor backgrounds; notes its efforts in trying to raise funds rather than rely on government handouts, and urges graduates of the university and all those who support it to back the campaign.

S3M-3682 University of St Andrews Fundraising Campaign (lodged on 11 March 2009) John Lamont*, Nanette Milne*, Jamie McGrigor*, Bill Aitken*, Mary Scanlon*, Jackson Carlaw*, John Park*, Elizabeth Smith*, Jamie Hepburn*, Margaret Mitchell*, Murdo Fraser*

S3M-3682 Ted Brocklebank: University of St Andrews Fundraising Campaign—That the Parliament supports the multi-million pound fundraising campaign by the University of St Andrews, launched by its new principal, Dr Louise Richardson, to mark the university’s 600th anniversary; applauds the university’s aim to create bursaries to attract talented students from poor backgrounds; notes its efforts in trying to raise funds rather than rely on government handouts, and urges graduates of the university and all those who support it to back the campaign. Supported by: John Lamont, Nanette Milne, Jamie McGrigor, Bill Aitken, Mary Scanlon, Jackson Carlaw, John Park, Elizabeth Smith, Jamie Hepburn, Margaret Mitchell, Murdo Fraser, Gil Paterson*, Jack McConnell*, Dr Richard Simpson*
S3M-3682 University of St Andrews Fundraising Campaign (lodged on 11 March 2009) David Stewart*
S3M-3682 University of St Andrews Fundraising Campaign (lodged on 11 March 2009) Tom McCabe*
